languages.text: "Протоколы предписывают, что Инквизиция находится вне юрисдикции Арбитес. Но сейчас ты не просто ставишь себя выше Лекс Империалис..." {n}В голосе проктора пробивается гневное рычание.{/n} "Ты играешь в бога! И я, тот, кто клялся хранить порядок в Империуме, должен молча на это смотреть? Нет".

"The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."
languages.original_text: "Протоколы предписывают, что Инквизиция находится вне юрисдикции Арбитес. Но сейчас ты не просто ставишь себя выше Лекс Империалис..." {n}В голосе проктора пробивается гневное рычание.{/n} "Ты играешь в бога! И я, тот, кто клялся хранить порядок в Империуме, должен молча на это смотреть? Нет".

I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

languages.text: “根据律法规定，审判庭的权力确实在法务部之上。然而，你的所作所为不仅凌驾于帝国律法之上……”{n}索罗蒙的声音中带着一丝怒意。{/n}“你还以神明自居！我发誓要维护帝国的秩序，那你觉得我会袖手旁观吗？想都别想。”
languages.original_text: "The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

traits.locale_text: “根据律法规定，审判庭的权力确实在法务部之上。然而，你的所作所为不仅凌驾于帝国律法之上……”{n}索罗蒙的声音中带着一丝怒意。{/n}“你还以神明自居！我发誓要维护帝国的秩序，那你觉得我会袖手旁观吗？想都别想。”
“根据律法规定，审判庭的权力确实在法务部之上。然而，你的所作所为不仅凌驾于帝国律法之上……”{n}索罗蒙的声音中带着一丝怒意。{/n}“你还以神明自居！我发誓要维护帝国的秩序，那你觉得我会袖手旁观吗？想都别想。”

languages.text: «Los protocolos dictan que la Inquisición está más allá de la autoridad del Adeptus Arbites. Pero no solo se ha posicionado por encima de la Lex Imperialis...». {n}Solomorne gruñe, furioso.{/n} «¡Está jugando a ser dios! Juré mantener el orden en el Imperium, ¿y ahora pretende que haga la vista gorda a esto? No».
languages.original_text: "The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

traits.locale_text: «Los protocolos dictan que la Inquisición está más allá de la autoridad del Adeptus Arbites. Pero no solo se ha posicionado por encima de la Lex Imperialis...». {n}Solomorne gruñe, furioso.{/n} «¡Está jugando a ser dios! Juré mantener el orden en el Imperium, ¿y ahora pretende que haga la vista gorda a esto? No».

languages.text: « Les protocoles indiquent que l'Inquisition ne relève pas de l'autorité de l'Adeptus Arbites. Non seulement vous outrepassez la Lex Imperialis... {n}La colère gronde dans la voix de Solomorne.{/n} Mais en plus, vous vous prenez pour une divinité ! J'ai juré de maintenir l'ordre dans l'Imperium, mais je devrais assister à vos actes misérables sans rien faire ? Hors de question. »
languages.original_text: "The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

traits.locale_text: « Les protocoles indiquent que l'Inquisition ne relève pas de l'autorité de l'Adeptus Arbites. Non seulement vous outrepassez la Lex Imperialis... {n}La colère gronde dans la voix de Solomorne.{/n} Mais en plus, vous vous prenez pour une divinité ! J'ai juré de maintenir l'ordre dans l'Imperium, mais je devrais assister à vos actes misérables sans rien faire ? Hors de question. »

languages.text: 「プロトコルでは、異端審問庁は高等裁定局の権限を超えるとある。でも、お前はレックス・インペリアを超えただけでなく…」{n}ソロモーンの声に怒りの唸りが混じった。{/n}「お前は神の真似をしている！俺は帝国の秩序を守ると誓った。なのに今、ただ見ているだけでいいと言うのか？そんなことはできない」
languages.original_text: "The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

traits.locale_text: 「プロトコルでは、異端審問庁は高等裁定局の権限を超えるとある。でも、お前はレックス・インペリアを超えただけでなく…」{n}ソロモーンの声に怒りの唸りが混じった。{/n}「お前は神の真似をしている！俺は帝国の秩序を守ると誓った。なのに今、ただ見ているだけでいいと言うのか？そんなことはできない」

languages.text: "Protokoller, Engizisyon'un Adeptus Arbites'in yetkisinin ötesinde olduğunu dikte ediyor. Fakat sen sadece kendini Lex İmperialis'in üzerine koymadın..." {n}Solomorne'un sesinde öfkeli bir hırıltı olduğunu işitiyorsun.{/n} "Sen tanrıyı oynuyorsun! İmparatorluk'ta düzeni sağlamaya yemin ettim ve şimdi öylece durup seni izlemem mi gerekiyor? Hayır."
languages.original_text: "The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

traits.locale_text: "Protokoller, Engizisyon'un Adeptus Arbites'in yetkisinin ötesinde olduğunu dikte ediyor. Fakat sen sadece kendini Lex Imperialis'in üzerine koymadın..." {n}Solomorne'un sesinde öfkeli bir hırıltı var.{/n} "Sen tanrıyı oynuyorsun! İmparatorluk'ta düzeni sağlamaya yemin ettim ve şimdi öylece durup seni izlemem mi gerekiyor? Hayır."

languages.text: "Die Protokolle geben vor, dass die Inquisition außerhalb der Autorität der Adeptus Arbites steht. Aber Ihr habt Euch nicht nur über das Lex Imperia gestellt ..." {n}Ein wütendes Knurren schleicht sich in Solomornes Stimme.{/n} "Ihr spielt Gott! Ich habe geschworen, die Ordnung im Imperium zu erhalten, und jetzt soll ich dabeistehen und Euch zusehen? Nein."
languages.original_text: "The protocols dictate that the Inquisition is beyond the authority of the Adeptus Arbites. But not only have you put yourself above the Lex Imperialis..." {n}An angry growl creeps into Solomorne's voice.{/n} "You are playing god! I swore to keep order in the Imperium, and now, I'm just supposed to stand by and watch you do this? No."

traits.locale_text: "Die Protokolle geben vor, dass die Inquisition außerhalb der Autorität der Adeptus Arbites steht. Aber Ihr habt Euch nicht nur über das Lex Imperia gestellt ..." {n}Ein wütendes Knurren schleicht sich in Solomornes Stimme.{/n} "Ihr spielt Gott! Ich habe geschworen, die Ordnung im Imperium zu erhalten, und jetzt soll ich dabeistehen und Euch zusehen? Nein."
